name: Crazy Car Chase
description:
Your car - your rules: feel the speed in the most addictive and entertaining car chase game ever made!

Drive your car crazy across a huge and expanding 3D city, avoid traffic and escape police in heart-stopping chases. Earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones.

With amazing graphics and realistic chases take your driving to new heights!
Master and unlock all available vehicles.

Incredible sense of speed and beautifully rendered surroundings makes CRAZY CAR CHASE one of the most exiting car chase game.
Step on the gas pedal, push your car’s engine to the limit and let the speed madness take over!
And it's free!

KEY FEATURES

● A lot of different cars to choose from!
● All vehicles have their own behaviour. Find your favourite!
● Smooth and realistic car handling!
● Stunning 3D graphics!
● Large, beautiful, driveable city!
● Physics based chaos and mayhem!

If car chase is your dream, this game is a MUST HAVE!
